section.title: Major features
section.para: We've introduced a new feature called Funding Invoice. This is a secondary invoice that you create during the Checkout process for enrolments into classes that have a default funding contract that isn't 'fee for service (non-funded)', to help track when you expect funding payments will come in. It ties in closely with the training plan that is set in the class window.
You can learn more about it in our documentation, here.
